sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
He visits Littlefinger's whore house with [[Morgan's friend|his friend]]. While there, they are confronted by the foreigner, [[Oberyn Martell]], who threatens Morgan and then stabs a dagger through his hand. He and his friend are forced to escape and treat the wound before it becomes fatal.<ref>"[[Two Swords]]"</ref>
